name: Osiris - The Heavenly Dragon
text: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). The ATK/DEF of this card each become equal to the number of cards in your hand x 1000. If a monster(s) is Summoned to your opponent's field in face-up Position, while this card is able to attack: That monster(s) loses 2000 ATK if it is in face-up Attack Position, but 2000 DEF if it is in face-up Defense Position, then if its affected ATK or DEF equals to 0, destroy it.
